ReferenceDocuments.name: Did the subject have [pre-spe
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the subject have [pre-specified medical condition/event/group of medical conditions]; Is the [pre-specified medical occurring ]?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC SDTM Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response Terminology
ReferenceDocuments.description: Terminology codelist used with Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response within the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium Study Data Tabulation Model.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Indicate if [specific medical condition/event] has occurred/is occurring by checking Yes or No.

ReferenceDocuments.name: MHOCCUR
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: MHOCCUR is used to report the occurrence of a pre-specified medical conditions or events. MHOCCUR is not used if the medical conditions or events are collected on the CRF in a manner that requires spontaneously free-text response. The site should be able to indicate that the response was not asked or answered.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have metastatic disease at initial diagnosis?

ReferenceDocuments.name: AMC Question Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the participant been diagnosed with progressive disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a solid tumor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a CNS tumor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have any solid tumor with inactivation of any of the DNA Damage Repair (DDR) genes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of lower extremity or pelvic deep venous thromboembolism or history of lower extremity cellulitis within 90 days of study entry?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG-Text- 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does this patient have down syndrome?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG-Test-10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have bone marrow relapse?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the patient NEWLY diagnosed with CNS disease during this reporting period?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: A known history of detectable plasma EBV DNA (via a PCR-based assay) at any time point since the initial diagnosis of NPC.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 13
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have a newly detectable CMV PCR in this reporting period?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 14
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient been diagnosed with Opsoclonus myoclonus ataxia syndrome (OMAS)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 15
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a primary CNS tumor?
